prompt_base: hyperdetailed cinematic portrait of an imposing elder wizard, massive curved demonic horns, long flowing white beard and hair, wrinkled pale blue skin, menacing red eyes, wearing ancient, tattered mystical robes
feature_prompt: extreme detail on skin texture and wrinkles, realistic white beard and hair strands, textured ancient fabric, sharp focus on horns
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, illustration, plastic texture, smooth skin, blue fur, blurry beard, youthful skin, low quality, simple robes
